translations: 普通书写（速记或打字）；普通写法

sentences.sentence: No one has taught him to write longhand!
sentences.translation: 没有人教过他如何书写！

sentences.sentence: He has help, but will write it himself, in longhand.
sentences.translation: 他有帮手，但是他将亲自手写出来。

sentences.sentence: He wrote his first and second drafts in longhand, in pencil.
sentences.translation: 他先用铅笔写下第一、第二甚至第三稿，最后用打字机完稿。
